channel.title: JavaScript and the DOM :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: The DOM tree is also accessible from JavaScript running in the page. It is accessed through the global window object, i.e. window.document or document. Let’s use the ‘Console’ tab of the developer tools to access this object. Open the previous example page again from this link. Click the console tab to open the expanded console, or use the console area in the bottom panel of the elements tab: With the console open, type:
